newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia's Indo-Rama to issue bonus.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia's Indo-Rama to issue bonus.

text.p: Indonesian polyester and resin producer Indo-Rama Synthetic said on Friday it planned to issue a bonus shares and split its stock.
Indo-Rama finance director Baldwa V.S. said the firm planned to issue four-to-five bonus shares.
"We also plan to split the nominal value of each ordinary share from 1,000 rupiah to 500 rupiah," he added.
Baldwa said those plans were subject to shareholders approval at its extraordinary general meeting on October 8.
He said the plan aimed to attract more local investors to the stock and increase its liquidity.
"Local investors had not been looking interested in Indorama due to perceptions that the price was high," he added.
